item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Various Artists - The Nightmare Before Christmas (Special Edition) (1993) [16bit / 44.1kHz]
item.description:
The Nightmare Before Christmas (Special Edition)
Various Artists, Danny Elfman
Soundtrack
1993

1. Overture - Danny Elfman
2. Opening - Patrick Stewart
3. This Is Halloween - The Citizens of Halloween
4. Jack's Lament - Danny Elfman
5. Doctor Finklestein / In The Forest - Danny Elfman
6. What's This? - Danny Elfman
7. Town Meeting Song - Cast of The Nightmare Before Christmas
8. Jack and Sally Montage - Danny Elfman
9. Jack's Obsession - Cast of The Nightmare Before Christmas
10. Kidnap The Sandy Claws - Danny Elfman, Paul Reubens & Catherine O'Hara
11. Making Christmas - The Citizens of Halloween
12. Nabbed - Danny Elfman
13. Oogie Boogie's Song - Ed Ivory
14. Sally's Song - Catherine O'Hara
15. Christmas Eve Montage - Danny Elfman
16. Poor Jack - Danny Elfman
17. To The Rescue - Danny Elfman
18. Finale / Reprise - Danny Elfman
19. Closing - Danny Elfman
20. End Title - Danny Elfman
21. This Is Halloween - Marilyn Manson
22. Sally's Song - Fiona Apple
23. What's This? - Fall Out Boy
24. Kidnap the Sandy Claws - She Wants Revenge
25. This is Halloween - Panic! At The Disco
26. Making Christmas - Danny Elfman
27. Oogie Boogie's Song - Danny Elfman
28. Kidnap the Sandy Claws - Danny Elfman
29. This is Halloween - Danny Elfman
